name: Angry Modest Ninja
description:
The modest humble ninja is back! More fun, more levels, more puzzles, more anger!

This game is meant to be played when:

◉ You're bored as a sack of potatoes!!!

◉ You're angry and just want to be left alone

◉ Your girlfriend/boyfriend left you... again! and you want to have some bubble time for yourself

◉ Your grades are not reflecting your true potential

◉ You want to play a yet another endless procedurally based level game that will make you trip, stumble and fall flat on your pretty little baby face

But don't take our word for it, it's not like we've created this game to be addictive and fun and cute and simple for your gaming pleasures.... nooo, we actually made this one just to annoy that little voice inside your head that asks to be punished, because you're just not good enough to get as far as possible (:

And well, if for some reason you do like the game and want to support further updates, please write or update your review on the AppStore!

That means the world to us, developers, and gives us more reasons to consume Surprise Chocolate Eggs everyday.

Thanks [;
